ModMetaData.name: AutoDrillRemastered
ModMetaData.author: Verakum
ModMetaData.description:
I am not the original developer of the mod, The credit goes to, Honshitsu, RedFrog and Pagan.
Having said that I am taking the mod development for now, the code will be available and free for download on my github.
Mod Version v1.0.2 - Added the option to enable or disable if infestations can spawn from these drills.
Mod Version v1.0.1 changes and functionality are below.
Why stand around a drill all day? You've got better things to do! Automated drills!
Speed based on a lv10 miner. Output yield scales with vanilla difficulty.
Basic AutoDrill - standard size bore (2 radius, 3x3) - average drill cycle of 5.5 hours - 80% deposit consumption - 80% resource output
Giant AutoDrill - wide bore (4 radius) - average drill cycle of 7 hours - high yield, more resources - low efficiency which depletes deposits more quickly - extract multiple stone chunks, an average of three and a half (3.5) per cycle - 300% deposit consumption - 200% resource output
Smart AutoDrill - small bore (0.5 radius, 1x1) - average drill cycle of 12 hours - hyper-efficient - cant cause infestation - cant extract stone chunks - 30% deposit consumption - 100% resource output
